noteR.para: Before repairing the sealing, check the sealing of the zone concerned vehicle : sealing checkGIEMR-002440.

procedure.title: PREPARATION OPERATION FOR REPAIRING THE SEALING
CHECK THE POSITION AND ADJUST IF NECESSARY:

ul.li: the clearances and flush fitting of the rear opening element vehicle panel gaps : adjustment valueGIEMR-001316,
rear opening element seals,
rear opening element strip rear opening element protective strip : removal - refittingGIEMR-000223,
rear lights,
rear air extractors,
rear opening element hinges,
number plate rivets,
rear wiper motor seal.

noteR.para: If the seals are dirty, clean them in soapy water vehicle sealing : general informationGIEMR-002468.

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES: check the sealing of the zone vehicle rear section : sealing repairGIEMR-002303.

procstep.para: Was water present in the passenger compartment of the vehicle?

ul.li: YES: move on to the next step.
NO: fault resolved.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE REAR OPENING ELEMENT SEAL

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the rear opening element sealing has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:
a) if the rear opening element seal is deformed, replace the rear opening element seal,
b) if the rear opening element seal shows signs of wear, cuts or cracks, replace the rear opening element seal.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the rear opening element seal vehicle rear section : sealing checkGIEMR-002302.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE REAR OPENING ELEMENT STRIP

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the rear opening element sealing has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:
a) if the rear opening element strip is deformed or cracked, replace the rear opening element strip rear opening element protective strip : removal - refittingGIEMR-000223,

b) if the sealing foam of the rear opening element strip is incorrectly positioned, detached or deformed, replace the rear opening element strip sealing foam rear opening element protective strip : removal - refittingGIEMR-000223.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the rear opening element strip vehicle rear section : sealing checkGIEMR-002302.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE REAR LIGHTS ON THE WING, ON THE REAR OPENING ELEMENT AND THE 3RD BRAKE LIGHT

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the rear lights on the wing, on the rear opening element and the 3rd brake light have been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step?
YES:

a) if the lights: on the rear wing, rear opening element or 3rd brake light are deformed or cracked, replace the light on the rear wing, on the rear opening element or the 3rd brake light light on body side, rear section : removal - refittingGIEMR-001226 or rear light assembly : removal - refittingGIEMR-001045 or light on rear opening element : removal - refittingGIEMR-001227 or 3rd brake light : removal - refittingGIEMR-000071,

b) if the seals of the lights: on the rear wing, rear opening element or 3rd brake light are incorrectly positioned or deformed, replace the light on the rear wing, on the rear opening element or the 3rd brake light light on body side, rear section : removal - refittingGIEMR-001226 or rear light assembly : removal - refittingGIEMR-001045 or light on rear opening element : removal - refittingGIEMR-001227 or 3rd brake light : removal - refittingGIEMR-000071,

c) the panelwork is deformed in the contact zone of the lights: on the rear wing, on the rear opening element or the 3rd brake light, flatten the panelwork in the contact zone of the seal for the light on the rear wing, on the rear opening element or the 3rd brake light.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the rear lights on the wing, on the rear opening element and the 3rd brake light vehicle rear section : sealing checkGIEMR-002302.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE REAR AIR EXTRACTOR

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the rear air extractor has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:
a) if the rear air extractor is deformed, replace the rear air extractor,
b) if the rear air extractor is incorrectly positioned, reposition the rear air extractor,
c) if the panelwork is deformed in the contact zone of the seal of the rear air extractor, flatten the panelwork in the contact zone of the rear air extractor seal.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the rear air extractor vehicle rear section : sealing checkGIEMR-002302.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE REAR OPENING ELEMENT HINGES

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the rear opening element hinges has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:

a) if the panelwork is deformed in the contact zone of the rear opening element hinge, flatten the contact zone of the rear opening element hinge, then apply filler mastic after assembly anti-corrosion protection : descriptionGIEMR-001837,
b) if the sealing mastic is faulty or cracked, apply filler mastic after assembly anti-corrosion protection : descriptionGIEMR-001837.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the rear opening element hinges vehicle rear section : sealing checkGIEMR-002302.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE NUMBER PLATE RIVETS ON AN OPENING ELEMENT

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the number plate rivets on the rear opening element has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:
a) if the rivets of the number plate are deformed or poorly crimped, replace the number plate rivets bodywork riveted assembly product : descriptionGIEMR-001823.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the number plate rivets vehicle rear section : sealing checkGIEMR-002302.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE REAR WIPER MOTOR SEAL

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the rear wiper motor seal has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:
a) if the rear wiper motor seal is incorrectly positioned, reposition the rear wiper motor seal rear screen wiper motor : removal - refittingGIEMR-000087,
b) if the rear wiper motor seal is deformed or shows signs of wear, cuts or cracks, replace the rear wiper motor seal rear screen wiper motor : removal - refittingGIEMR-000087.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the rear wiper motor seal vehicle rear section : sealing checkGIEMR-002302.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE REAR AERODYNAMIC COMPONENT

procstep.para: s water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the rear aerodynamic component has been checked?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES:
a) if the rear aerodynamic component is deformed or cracked, replace the rear aerodynamic component rear opening element spoiler : removal - refittingGIEMR-000256,

b) if the sealing foam of the rear aerodynamic component is deformed, torn or detached, replace the sealing foam of the rear aerodynamic component rear opening element spoiler : removal - refittingGIEMR-000256.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the rear aerodynamic component vehicle rear section : sealing checkGIEMR-002302.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE MASTIC FILLING OF THE REAR WING PANEL / REAR WING PANEL RAIN CHANNEL / REAR LIGHT MOUNTING / REAR END PANEL AND REAR WING PANEL RAIN CHANNEL / ROOF

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the sealing of the mastic filling of the rear wing panel / rear wing panel rain channel / rear light mounting / rear end panel and rear wing panel rain channel / roof has been checked?

ul.li: NO: fault resolved.
YES:

a) if the mastic is faulty or incorrectly positioned on the panelwork connections, apply extruded mastic to the panelwork connections after assembly anti-corrosion protection : descriptionGIEMR-001837.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the mastic filling of the rear wing panel / rear wing panel rain channel / rear light mounting / rear end panel and rear wing panel rain channel / roof vehicle rear section : sealing checkGIEMR-002302.
